languages.text: "Согласно архивным сведениям, да. На ее Магнэ Ацессио присутствовали почтенные Каллигос Винтерскейл и Аспис Чорда, предшественница Инцендии. Эта неформальная традиция, визит глав династий на церемонию призван подтвердить, что они признают нового Вольного Торговца ровней себе, готовы уважать его привилегии и не покушаться на его владения... больше обычного".

"Archival records indicate that they did. Lady Theodora's Magnae Accessio was attended by the esteemed Calligos Winterscale and Aspyce Chorda, Incendia's predecessor. It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."
languages.original_text: "Согласно архивным сведениям, да. На ее Магнэ Ацессио присутствовали почтенные Каллигос Винтерскейл и Аспис Чорда, предшественница Инцендии. Эта неформальная традиция, визит глав династий на церемонию призван подтвердить, что они признают нового Вольного Торговца ровней себе, готовы уважать его привилегии и не покушаться на его владения... больше обычного".

It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

languages.text: 「記録によれば、そのようです。シオドーラ様のマグナ・アクセシオはカリゴス・ウィンタースケールと、インセンディアの前任者であるアスパイス・コーダが参加していました。公式の伝統ではありませんが、式典参加者の証言によれば、他王朝のトップが新しい自由開拓者を同じ地位の一員として認め、その特権に敬意を表するとともに現自由開拓者たちの持つ特権は侵害しないことを確認する…少なくとも、これまでどおりでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Archival records indicate that they did. Lady Theodora's Magnae Accessio was attended by the esteemed Calligos Winterscale and Aspyce Chorda, Incendia's predecessor. It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

traits.locale_text: 「記録によれば、そのようです。シオドーラ様のマグナ・アクセシオはカリゴス・ウィンタースケールと、インセンディアの前任者であるアスパイス・コーダが参加していました。公式の伝統ではありませんが、式典参加者の証言によれば、他王朝のトップが新しい自由開拓者を同じ地位の一員として認め、その特権に敬意を表するとともに現自由開拓者たちの持つ特権は侵害しないことを確認する…少なくとも、これまでどおりでしょう」

languages.text: “档案记录表明确实如此。尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，以及因森蒂娅的前任行商浪人阿斯拜丝·库尔达，都参加了西奥多拉夫人的继任颂典。邀请其他行商浪人前来观礼，是约定俗成的传统。这代表其他王朝的首领认可新任行商浪人享有与自己同等的特权，承诺不侵犯对方的财产……至少不会趁人之危，得寸进尺。”
languages.original_text: "Archival records indicate that they did. Lady Theodora's Magnae Accessio was attended by the esteemed Calligos Winterscale and Aspyce Chorda, Incendia's predecessor. It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

traits.locale_text: “档案记录表明确实如此。尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，以及因森蒂娅的前任行商浪人阿斯拜丝·库尔达，都参加了西奥多拉夫人的继任颂典。邀请其他行商浪人前来观礼，是约定俗成的传统。这代表其他王朝的首领认可新任行商浪人享有与自己同等的特权，承诺不侵犯对方的财产……至少不会趁人之危，得寸进尺。”

languages.text: «Según los registros del archivo, así es. A la Magnae Accessio de lady Theodora asistieron los estimados Calligos Winterscale y Aspyce Chorda, que ocupaba el puesto antes que Incendia. Es una tradición informal. Al presenciar la ceremonia, los líderes de las otras dinastías confirman que reconocen a{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente como su igual y que están dispuestos a respetar sus privilegios y no entrometerse en sus asuntos... más de lo normal, por lo menos».
languages.original_text: "Archival records indicate that they did. Lady Theodora's Magnae Accessio was attended by the esteemed Calligos Winterscale and Aspyce Chorda, Incendia's predecessor. It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

traits.locale_text: «Según los registros del archivo, así es. A la Magnae Accessio de lady Theodora asistieron los estimados Calligos Winterscale y Aspyce Chorda, que ocupaba el puesto antes que Incendia. Es una tradición informal. Al presenciar la ceremonia, los líderes de las otras dinastías confirman que reconocen a{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente como su igual y que están dispuestos a respetar sus privilegios y no entrometerse en sus asuntos... más de lo normal, por lo menos».

languages.text: « Les archives indiquent que oui, en effet. Les honorables Calligos Winterscale et Aspyce Chorda, la prédécesseure d'Incendia, ont tous deux assisté à la Magnae Accessio de dame Théodora. C'est en quelque sorte une tradition officieuse. En faisant acte de présence à la cérémonie, les dirigeants des autres dynasties confirment qu'ils reconnaissent le nouveau libre-marchand comme leur égal, qu'ils respectent ses privilèges et qu'ils n'empiéteront pas sur son territoire... pas plus que d'habitude, à tout le moins. »
languages.original_text: "Archival records indicate that they did. Lady Theodora's Magnae Accessio was attended by the esteemed Calligos Winterscale and Aspyce Chorda, Incendia's predecessor. It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

traits.locale_text: « Les archives indiquent que oui, en effet. Les honorables Calligos Winterscale et Aspyce Chorda, la prédécesseure d'Incendia, ont tous deux assisté à la Magnae Accessio de dame Théodora. C'est en quelque sorte une tradition officieuse. En faisant acte de présence à la cérémonie, les dirigeants des autres dynasties confirment qu'ils reconnaissent le nouveau libre-marchand comme leur égal, qu'ils respectent ses privilèges et qu'ils n'empiéteront pas sur son territoire… pas plus que d'habitude, à tout le moins. »

languages.text: "Laut Archiv schon. Bei Lady Theodoras Magnae Accessio waren die geschätzten Calligos Winterzunder und Aspyce Chorda, Incendias Vorgängerin, zugegen. Es handelt sich um eine informelle Tradition – durch Beiwohnen der Zeremonie bestätigen die Oberhäupter der anderen Dynastien, dass sie den neuen Freihändler als gleichwertig anerkennen, dass sie seine Privilegien akzeptieren und seinen Besitz in Ruhe lassen ... zumindest im gleichen Rahmen wie sonst."
languages.original_text: "Archival records indicate that they did. Lady Theodora's Magnae Accessio was attended by the esteemed Calligos Winterscale and Aspyce Chorda, Incendia's predecessor. It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

traits.locale_text: "Laut Archiv schon. Bei Lady Theodoras Magnae Accessio waren die geschätzten Calligos Winterzunder und Aspyce Chorda, Incendias Vorgängerin, zugegen. Es handelt sich um eine informelle Tradition – durch Beiwohnen der Zeremonie bestätigen die Oberhäupter der anderen Dynastien, dass sie den neuen Freihändler als gleichwertig anerkennen, dass sie seine Privilegien akzeptieren und seinen Besitz in Ruhe lassen ... zumindest im gleichen Rahmen wie sonst."

languages.text: "Arşiv kayıtlarına göre evet, gelmiş. Leydi Theodora'nın Magnae Accessio'suna saygın Calligos Winterscale ile İncendia'nın selefi Aspyce Chorda katılmış. Bu gayriresmî bir gelenektir. Diğer hanedanların başları; merasime tanıklık ederek yeni Hür Tacir'i denkleri olarak tanıdıklarını, Hür Tacir'in imtiyazlarına saygı duyacaklarını ve topraklarına en azından normalde yaptıklarından daha fazla tecavüz etmeyeceklerini teyit ederler."
languages.original_text: "Archival records indicate that they did. Lady Theodora's Magnae Accessio was attended by the esteemed Calligos Winterscale and Aspyce Chorda, Incendia's predecessor. It is an informal tradition — by witnessing the ceremony, the heads of the other dynasties confirm that they recognise the new Rogue Trader as their equal, that they are willing to respect the new Rogue Trader's privileges and not encroach upon their holdings... no more than usual, at least."

traits.locale_text: "Arşiv kayıtlarına göre evet, gelmiş. Leydi Theodora'nın Magnae Accessio'suna saygın Calligos Winterscale ile İncendia'nın selefi Aspyce Chorda katılmış. Bu gayri resmî bir gelenektir. Diğer hanedanların başları merasime tanıklık ederek yeni Hür Tacir'i denkleri olarak tanıdıklarını, Hür Tacir'in imtiyazlarına saygı duyacaklarını ve varlıklarına en azından her zamankinden daha fazla tecavüz etmeyeceklerini teyit ederler."
